doc.title: First
doc.plot: First is a compilation of 10 women's person histories of their developing sexuality. The women of First welcome us into their bedrooms and their private past sharing 'first' stories. We learn about the sexual path from first kiss to first orgasm that is so unique but in many ways so similar across women. The women in First come from a variety of geographic backgrounds: urban, suburban and rural, a variety of racial/ethnic backgrounds, and a variety of socio-economic backgrounds. In addition, the women in First span four generations revealing the change in sexual attitudes from the 1920's through today.
